text: Nancy Pelosi Insists the Election Was Not a Rebuke of the Democrats  —  Devin Oktar Yalkin for The New York Times  —  Perhaps no Democratic politician has been a greater antagonist to Donald Trump than Nancy Pelosi.  As the House minority leader and then speaker of the House during Trump's first term …
